column1: 17.  A perusal of the impugned Court of Appeal judgment dated 25th January 2018 confirms

J.  (as  he  was  then)  held  that  the  Appellant’s  failure  to  annex  a  certified  copy  of  the
impugned  proceedings  left  the  Court  with  no  material  upon  which  to  consider  the
application. Furthermore, in the absence of a legitimate justification excusing the failure
